name: Latonsus & Rocky - Rocky's Birthday
description:
A project made within 3 months from a group of college student. A game where an old man named Latonsus and an Orc named Rocky chases a witch that stole Rocky's Birthday cake.

This project was made to learn how to make games within a shot period of time following different deadline times (usually Prototype, Alpha, Beta and Gold)

Game made by Eric Reyes (Programmer), Luis Giraldo and Dani Quesada (Artists) and Sergi Morral  (Game Design)
